original_text: God broke off the proper branches and he did not let them stay in the tree. So, if you no longer trust him, he will not let you stay either. God broke off the proper branches and he did not let them stay in the tree. So, if you no longer trust him, he will not let you stay either.
korean_text: 하나님이 원 가지들도 아끼지 아니하셨은즉 너도 아끼지 아니하시리라

sentences.original_text: God broke off the proper branches
and he did not let them stay in the tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 나무에 머무르지 못하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: So, if you no longer trust him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 만약 당신이 더 이상 그를 신뢰하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: he will not let you stay either
sentences.korean_translation: 그분도 당신이 머무르는 것을 허락하지 않을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: God broke off the proper branches
and he did not let them stay in the tree
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 나무에 머무르지 못하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: So, if you no longer trust him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 만약 당신이 더 이상 그를 신뢰하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: he will not let you stay either
sentences.korean_translation: 그분도 당신이 머무르는 것을 허락하지 않을 것입니다
